summary: This endpoint returns the health status of Vault.

parameters.name: standbyok
parameters.description: pecifies if being a standby should still return the active status code instead of the standby status code.

parameters.name: activecode
parameters.description: Specifies the status code that should be returned for an active node.

parameters.name: standbycode
parameters.description: Specifies the status code that should be returned for a standby node.

parameters.name: drsecondarycode
parameters.description: Specifies the status code that should be returned for a DR secondary node.

parameters.name: performancestandbycode
parameters.description: Specifies the status code that should be returned for a performance standby node.

parameters.name: sealedcode
parameters.description: Specifies the status code that should be returned for a sealed node.

parameters.name: uninitcode
parameters.description: Specifies the status code that should be returned for a uninitialized node.
